Text: Thanks, dunno why Bethesda has to get so butthurt over it, it's only 10 days from release and they've closed livestreams and pulled down YouTube videos. All watchers are potential customers like myself.

Thanks for uploading man! People were tripping out about the graphics, but it's obviously a low-res capture. Looks stretched too. 
Can't wait for 11.11.11.
It's nearly here! I hope it gets uploaded the second it comes out! I'll leave my computer on all night if I have to. If the game is good and plays on my PC, however. I will buy it.

Wow, these videos prove how shitty Skyrim is in fact. No wonder pulls the videos off, because no one will buy it once they have seen this. It will be same for pc, the typical console inventory menu alone is despicable.

@Landplacker I hope you are kidding. This seems awesome, including the graphiics.

..I just sincerely hope Skyrim hasn't been dumbed down to much.  That'll crush my faith in two companies this year.  Bioware with DA2, and now Bethesda with simplefest Skyrim.

The graphics are pathetic. This is what you get on xbox 360, eye sore at 720p. Definatly going to have to get it for pc.
